title: Unable to connect to chat?
body: Tonight I have not been able to play league because of what seems to be a connection issue. Everything runs perfectly until after i login. When the client first appears, I receive a message reading "Unknown Error has occurred." After logging out and in multiple times AND restarting my computer several times, the issue was NOT resolved. I uninstalled and reinstalled League. Again. Same issue. Only this time it doesn't have the tiny window pop up but and the bottom of the client there is 2 messages reading "Reconnect to Chat" and "Unable to connect to chat, you may reconnect manually." Of course I have clicked the reconnect button but it doesn't work. I run a MacBook air 2013. The computer is new it cannot possibly be the issue. So my question is: Is there a well known solution that I don't know of? And is anyone else having the same issue?

replies.body: There were some server issues during this period, but everything should be fine now.  Make sure to bookmark the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for updates on server issues.  Let me know if you still have issues with this!
The problem was resolved this morning thank you for fixing the issue
